content: Singaporean association football clubFootball club **Siglap Football Club** is an association football club based in [Siglap](/wiki/Siglap), [Singapore](/wiki/Singapore). The club competes in [Singapore Football League](/wiki/Singapore_National_Football_League). In 2016, the club was the finalist in [Singapore FA Cup](/wiki/Singapore_FA_Cup), losing 3–1 to [Home United Prime League](/wiki/Lion_City_Sailors_F.C.). - Home United FC beats Siglap FC 3-1 in Singapore Pools FA Cup final - "Members – Football Association of Singapore". *fas.org.sg*. Retrieved 2018-11-02. - http://www.fas.org.sg/minor_team/siglap-fc/ This article about a [Singaporean](/wiki/Singapore) [football](/wiki/Association_football) club is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it. - v - t - e
title: Siglap FC
